name: Codename: QuestORama
description:
Don't download yet! I need to make a *REAL* package. You won't be able to run the game with that APK. I need to fix my Unreal editor, or find somebody to compile the game for me. Right now the game is stuck on my Quest alone. Sorry, check back later! 

This isn't a complete game, or a beta, it might not even be an Alpha! It's just a test bed for code elements that will EVENTUALLY become a "Digital Survival Game". It's a weird game idea that I'm slowly working my way TOWARDS, but am no where near. So tell me what you like and what you want, maybe it'll get into the game. 

And don't whine too much, it's FREE.
